content.content:
Dear all backers,
Thank you so much for your support and patience.  What a pleasant journey!
So far, we have received $17,000 and support from 170 backers.
We have browsed the comment section and everyone has some doubts about the product material being Tritan.
TX2001 is an amorphous copolyester raw material produced by Eastman Chemical Company. It has excellent appearance and transparency, and contains a plant-based release agent. TX2001 performs well in food contact applications, meets food grade standards, and has chemical resistance and high heat resistance, capable of withstanding temperatures up to 109 ℃.

Application area 
TX2001 is widely used in the fields of large and small household appliances, electrical appliances, and household goods. Its excellent physical and chemical properties make it perform outstandingly in these applications
Hydrogen is difficult to dissolve in water?
Under standard conditions, the solubility of hydrogen is very low, with a maximum solubility of 1.83 milliliters of hydrogen per 100 milliliters of water, which is 1.83%. Although hydrogen has a slightly higher biological solubility of about 0.8 mM, which means it dissolves 1.6 milligrams per liter of water. ‌1
Hydrogen is a colorless, odorless, and tasteless gas with a very low density, making it the smallest known gas in terms of density. It is difficult to dissolve in water at room temperature and pressure, and usually exists in a gaseous state. Only under high pressure conditions will hydrogen partially dissolve in water.
Although hydrogen is difficult to dissolve in water, it can dissolve in water under certain specific conditions, such as high pressure or specific temperatures. Our product has been pressurized. ‌
